info.official_title: Toripalimab Combined With Neoadjuvant Chemoradiotherapy as First-line Treatment for Locally Advanced，High-Risk，MSS Rectal Cancer

identified_line.line: * Age 18-75 years old, female and male;
* Pathological confirmed MSS or pMMR rectal adenocarcinoma;
* Adequate organ function defined at baseline as:
ANC ≥1.5××109/L，PLt ≥100×109 /L，Hb ≥90 g/L，15×109 /L≥WBC≥4×109 /L; TBIL ≤1.5×ULN, ALT ≤1.5ULN, AST ≤1.5ULN, BUN and Cr ≤1.5×ULN or Ccr
* 60ml/min (Cockcroft-Gault formula);INR ≤1.5×ULN or PT ≤1.5×ULN (when patient didn't accept anticoagulant therapy);

criterions.exact_snippets: when patient didn't accept anticoagulant therapy

condition.exact_snippets: when patient didn't accept anticoagulant therapy

identified_line.line: * Women of childbearing age must have taken reliable contraceptive measures or have a pregnancy test (serum or urine) within 7 days prior to enrollment and the results are negative;

criterions.exact_snippets: must have taken reliable contraceptive measures
have a pregnancy test (serum or urine) within 7 days prior to enrollment and the results are negative
have a pregnancy test (serum or urine) within 7 days prior to enrollment and the results are negative

have a pregnancy test (serum or urine) within 7 days prior to enrollment and the results are negative

identified_line.line: Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
* Pathological confirmed rectal squamous cell carcinoma;

criterions.exact_snippets: Pathological confirmed rectal squamous cell carcinoma

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Pathological confirmed rectal squamous cell carcinoma

identified_line.line: * History of other uncured malignancies within 5 years;

criterions.exact_snippets: History of other uncured malignancies within 5 years
History of other uncured malignancies within 5 years

and_criteria.exact_snippets: History of other uncured malignancies within 5 years
History of other uncured malignancies within 5 years

identified_line.line: * Allergic to any component of chemotherapy or immunotherapy;

criterions.exact_snippets: Allergic to any component of chemotherapy
Allergic to any component of ... immunotherapy

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Allergic to any component of chemotherapy
Allergic to any component of ... immunotherapy

identified_line.line: * History of any active, known, or suspected autoimmune disease, including but not limited to myasthenia gravis,Myositis, autoimmune hepatitis, systemic lupus erythematosus, rheumatoid arthritis,Inflammatory bowel disease, vascular thrombosis associated with antiphospholipid syndrome, Wegener granulation Swollen disease, Sjogren's syndrome, Guillain-Barre syndrome, multiple sclerosis, vasculitis or Glomerulonephritis.

criterions.exact_snippets: History of any active, known, or suspected autoimmune disease
vascular thrombosis associated with antiphospholipid syndrome
criterions.criterion: vascular thrombosis associated with antiphospholipid syndrome

and_criteria.exact_snippets: History of any active, known, or suspected autoimmune disease

or_criteria.exact_snippets: vascular thrombosis associated with antiphospholipid syndrome
or_criteria.criterion: vascular thrombosis associated with antiphospholipid syndrome

identified_line.line: * With congenital or acquired immunodeficiency (such as those with HIV infection), active hepatitis B or hepatitis C;
* Clinical stage T3-4 (AJCC 8th) and at least with one high risk factor（CRM+ or EMVI+ or lateral lymph nodes+）;

criterions.exact_snippets: at least with one high risk factor（CRM+ or EMVI+ or lateral lymph nodes+）

at least with one high risk factor（CRM+ or EMVI+ or lateral lymph nodes+）

identified_line.line: * No previous chemotherapy, radiotherapy, immunotherapy or other anti-tumor treatment;
